titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Hidesaburo Hanafusa papers, Rockefeller University Faculty FA1112

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-09-09 00:07:33 -0400.

did.unittitle: Hidesaburo Hanafusa papers, Rockefeller University Faculty

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Level 1 Minimal Processing has been conducted to establish basic intellectual and physical control of the material and assess immediate preservation and conservation needs. Material remains as received, in original folders and storage boxes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted pending permission from Rockefeller University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one copy of Hanafusa's lectures.

did.unittitle: The Darwin Lectures, "Cellular Genes and Oncogenesis". Three Lectures by Hidesaburo Hanafusa.
did.physdesc:
Multiple copies of lectures, including those with handwritten revisions.
One bound volume, and several unbound copies.
